summary: We testified on Education's troubled rollout of its newly simplified student aid application. Students rely on the Free Application for Federal Student Aid—FAFSA—to determine their eligibility for federal grants and loans. Education streamlined the form this application cycle to make the process easier for students. But the rollout was delayed 3 months. Multiple technical issues also blocked some students from completing the form. Support for...
title: FAFSA: Education Needs to Improve Communications and Support Around the Free Application for Federal Student Aid
